parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description:
The ID of the check item.

> You can call the [DescribeCheckWarningSummary](~~DescribeCheckWarningSummary~~) operation to query the IDs of check items.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: FilterUuid
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset that you don't want to query.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The information about the server that you want to query. The value can be the name or the public IP address of the server.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the IDs.

parameters.name: RiskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the baseline.

> You can call the [DescribeCheckWarningSummary](~~DescribeCheckWarningSummary~~) operation to query the IDs of baselines.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The risk status of the check item. Valid values:

*   **1**: failed
*   **3**: passed
